attributes.additional_details: This position is to support my son who has cerebral palsy get the adaptions he deserves to lead an independent life. He deserves to be able to move around his own home on his wheelchair on his own, he deserves to have easy access to a downstairs toilet, he deserves to be part of the family daily activities, to have a bathroom where he can shower and be changed with some dignity. His sister deserves to have her own space and not be sleeping in the living room. Please help us to help jamie and his family.  We ask for the council/government to look at our individual circumstances and re look at our housing issues. Thank you for your support.
